ApprovalSubmissionDetail.name: ApprovalSubmissionDetail
ApprovalSubmissionDetail.description: ApprovalSubmissionDetail contains additional information about operations happening during the approval lifecycle. It will not hold any information thatâ€™s already captured in the existing ApprovalSubmission and ApprovalWorkItem entities.

ActionChannelName.description: The name of the channel where the action was performed.

ActionContext.description: The context of the action taken for the item assigned for approval. For example, if the approval has been reassigned the string would be Reassigned from User Id - <original_assignee_id>.

ActionName.description: The action taken for the item assigned for approval.

ActionPerformedById.description: The ID of the user who performed the action on the item submitted for approval.

ActionPerformerRole.description: The role of the user who performed the action on the item submitted for approval.

ApprovalSubmissionId.description: The approval submission that's associated with the detail record.

ApprovalWorkItemId.description: The approval assignment associated with the detail record.

Comments.description: The comments added by the user who performed the action.

Name.description: The sequentially-generated name of the approval submission detail record, for example ASD-000000026.
